editorialNotes.standard: We love chilling with friends in this classic card game’s standard mode or shaking things up with wild new rules and team-based play.
Custom decks, quick matches, and new twists make this smartly designed mobile spin on the beloved card collector a great fit for both newcomers and veterans.
Be our guest and bring iconic Disney and Pixar scenes to life in this charming Tri Peaks solitaire game.

ios.subtitle: Make dank memes and have fun!
Train your brain and kill time

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Clear boards by spelling words rather than building piles of cards in this clever spin on the all-time classic.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Build streaks and candify postcards of locations like Waikiki Beach and the Eiffel Tower in this sugary sweet spin on solitaire.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: There’s nothing quite like Solitaire. This classic game can be as peaceful or intense as you’d like—and we can’t decide if we’d rather compete with the clock or just relax and reshuffle until we find the right card. Microsoft’s updated the experience with colorful backdrops and plenty of new modes. And yes—they’ve kept that iconic jumping-cards victory screen

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Think you know solitaire? Think again. Stack cards to cast spells and rid your wizard school of ghosts, mandrakes, and more.
